tweet: I want to do a lesson on the costs and BENEFITS of Mexican immigration.  Anyone know of good resources to use with the kids?
Good resource for teaching about cultures: http://tinyurl.com/ydfco7c.  I have a lower reading level version- but I can't find it online.
Well at least the fight wasn't in my classroom on my birthday.  How many times stepping next door to calm things down is too many?
Ever get the feeling that there's always something more you should be doing to be a better teacher?  Makes me tired just thinking about it.
28 hours of consciousness and a slight headache later, I've officially survived "Guys Night Out."
